name: TownhallReview
0:
”Alexa, play TownHall Review”
”Alexa, tell Townhall Review to play”
”Alexa, ask Townhall Review to play”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: townhall review
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Townhall Review with Hugh Hewitt podcast represents the best news and feature interviews from key voices in news, politics and culture today. Hugh Hewitt hosts the right-of-center podcast and guides the efforts for the team that brings together political commentary, news analysis and feature interviews from the top hosts in talk-radio today.

Subscribers to the podcast also enjoy the fast-paced recap of the week’s political events. The Townhall Review with Hugh Hewitt is also a syndicated radio program heard on 200-plus stations each weekend. 
All of the audio content for the program is available at TownhallReview.com.

You can rely on Townhall Review with Hugh Hewitt to provide the who-said-what in U.S. politics, global news and breaking news. Townhall Review honors your conservative principles and enable you to participate in the conversation on issues shaping our nation.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
